name: Moon Invaders (Dep-kun-Codes)
description:
ABILTIES {

IMMOLATE: a extremely powerful attack that instantly kills any opponent | user takes 4 damage.

BOLT_TRAVEL: fire a bolt of pure energy in the last direction you moved for massive damage then 1 second later DASH in the last direction you moved | user takes 1 damage.

DIG: remove all walls on level and regenerate all your health | takes 3 turns to use.

GOLDMINE: turn the walls you are currently touching into valuable Gold.

REPLICATOR: replicate a random spell.

BOLT: fire a bolt of pure energy in the last direction you moved for massive damage | takes 1 turn to use.

CROSSBOLT: fires energy beams in the cardinal directions dealing 2 damage.

EXBOLT: fires energy beams in diagonal directions  dealing 3 damage.

WOOP: teleport to a random space.

HEAL: heals player for 2 damage.

MAELSTROM: move monsters to random places and stun them for 2 turns.

DASH: dash in the direction you last moved dealing on damage on impact with target

}

run into enemies to deal damage 

and reach the warp pad to get to the next level

use keys 1-9 to use abilities
